Containers.Name: nwipe (Secure Disk Eraser) for UNRAID
Containers.Description: nwipe is a program that will securely erase the entire contents of disks, with a ncurses GUI. It can help you make sure that your precious data is gone for good, before you sell or RMA your disks. nwipe is a fork of the dwipe command originally used by Darik's Boot and Nuke (DBAN).
Containers.Changes: ###2024.06.21 - release note: welcome to the first version of the package.
